original_text: But with many of them God was not well pleased: for they were overthrown in the wilderness.
korean_text: 그러나 그들의 다수를 하나님이 기뻐하지 아니하셨으므로 그들이 광야에서 멸망을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: But with many of them God was not well pleased:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들 중 많은 사람들에게 하나님은 기뻐하지 않으셨습니다:

sentences.original_text: for they were overthrown in the wilderness.
